author: Ildefonso Ortiz
title: Mexico Surpasses 1500 Coronavirus Cases, 50 Fatalities
description: Mexican health officials recorded 1,510 cases of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19). To date, 50 have died as a direct result.
content:
Mexican health officials recorded 1,510 cases of the novel Coronavirus (COVID-19). To date, 50 have died as a direct result.
Federal health officials in Mexico City released the new statistics during a daily streamed conference. The number of cases jumped by… [+2080 chars]
